document_data.name: Nezram's sapphire screen of shielding
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nezram's sapphire screen of shielding''''' was an [[abjuration]] spell that had the dubious distinction of having one of the longest names in the school of Abjuration.
document_data.Effects: It created a floating, square shaped shield of [[sapphire]] blue colored force that protected the target from physical and magical attacks.
document_data.History: This spell was presumably developed by [[Nezram]].
